title: Foods Around the World
description: Foods Around the World is about the fascinating variety of foods enjoyed by cultures around the globe. The book introduces an array of ethnic foods and provides examples of fun recipes for students to try. Maps and pictures support the text as readers travel on a culinary trip around the world in search of the delicious (to some) and the disgusting (to others).
meta: borscht, cacoa, cannoli, delicacy, escargot, flying fox, fragrant, game, regions, rich, specialty, sushi
Use the reading strategy of making connections to prior knowledge to understand nonfiction text
Fact or Opinion : Correctly distinguish fact and opinion
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a list

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
